about.summary: Easily and flexibly insert 'Font Awesome' icons into 'R Markdown' documents and 'Shiny' apps. These icons can be inserted into HTML content through inline 'SVG' tags or 'i' tags. There is also a utility function for exporting 'Font Awesome' icons as 'PNG' images for those situations where raster graphics are needed.

Easily and flexibly insert 'Font Awesome' icons into 'R Markdown' documents and 'Shiny' apps. These icons can be inserted into HTML content through inline 'SVG' tags or 'i' tags. There is also a utility function for exporting 'Font Awesome' icons as 'PNG' images for those situations where raster graphics are needed.

name: r-fontawesome
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fontawesome
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/fontawesome_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/fontawesome/fontawesome_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1b1909d0fad5ec4c658f5c628a195b9bd93d544afa957e68e897224cfb81fb4f

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools >=0.5.1.1
    - r-rlang >=0.4.10
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools >=0.5.1.1
    - r-rlang >=0.4.10

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('fontawesome')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('fontawesome')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/rstudio/fontawesome
  license: MIT
  summary: Easily and flexibly insert 'Font Awesome' icons into 'R Markdown' documents and 'Shiny' apps. These icons can be inserted into HTML content through inline 'SVG' tags or 'i' tags. There is also a utility function for exporting 'Font Awesome' icons as 'PNG' images for those situations where raster graphics are needed.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
